mapper.select: select distinct sm.perms from sys_user_role ur left join sys_role_menu rm on ur.role_id = rm.role_id left join sys_menu sm on sm.id = rm.menu_id where ur.user_id = #{userId} and sm.status = 0 and sm.menu_type in ('C', 'F') and sm.del_flag = 0

select distinct DISTINCT sm.id, sm.parent_id, sm.menu_name, sm.path, sm.component, sm.visible, sm.status, IFNULL(sm.perms, '') AS perms, sm.is_frame, sm.menu_type, sm.icon, sm.order_num, sm.create_time from sys_menu sm where sm.status = 0 and sm.menu_type in ('C', 'M') and sm.del_flag = 0 order by sm.parent_id, sm.order_num

select distinct sm.id, sm.parent_id, sm.menu_name, sm.path, sm.component, sm.visible, sm.status, IFNULL(sm.perms, '') as perms, sm.is_frame, sm.menu_type, sm.icon, sm.order_num, sm.create_time from sys_user_role ur left join sys_role_menu rm on ur.role_id = rm.role_id left join sys_menu sm on sm.id = rm.menu_id where ur.user_id = #{userId} and sm.status = 0 and sm.menu_type in ('C', 'M') and sm.del_flag = 0 order by sm.parent_id, sm.order_num

select m.id from sys_menu m left join sys_role_menu rm on m.id = rm.menu_id where rm.role_id = #{roleId}
order by m.parent_id, m.order_num
